golem.util.validation

Class DimensionValidation

  • golem.util.validation.DimensionValidation

  • public class DimensionValidation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ValidationContext dim(ValidationContext $receiver, int rows, int cols)
      Require the current matrix to have exactly the given number of rows and columns.
      static ValidationContext dim(ValidationContext $receiver, int rows, char cols)
      Require the current matrix to have exactly the given number of rows and match the number of columns with other dimensions in other matrices based on the cols variable name.
      static ValidationContext dim(ValidationContext $receiver, char rows, int cols)
      Require the current matrix to have exactly the given number of columns and match the number of rows with other dimensions in other matrices based on the rows variable name.
      static ValidationContext dim(ValidationContext $receiver, char rows, char cols)
      Require the current matrix's dimensions to correspond to the given variable names. Compares with other dimensions in other matrices in the context that are assigned the same variable name and raises an error if they don't all match.
      static ValidationContext getTransposable(ValidationContext $receiver)
      Accept a transposed version of the matrix as satisfying the dimensions check. For example, allow a 1 x 3 matrix when dimensions are declared as 3 x 1.

    • Method Detail

      • dim

        public static ValidationContext dim(ValidationContext $receiver,
                                    int rows,
                                    int cols)

        Require the current matrix to have exactly the given number of rows and columns.

        Parameters:
        rows - Fixed number of rows to require.
        cols - Fixed number of columns to require.

      • dim

        public static ValidationContext dim(ValidationContext $receiver,
                                    int rows,
                                    char cols)

        Require the current matrix to have exactly the given number of rows and match the number of columns with other dimensions in other matrices based on the cols variable name.

        Parameters:
        rows - Fixed number of rows to require.
        cols - Variable name for the number of cols in the matrix

      • dim

        public static ValidationContext dim(ValidationContext $receiver,
                                    char rows,
                                    int cols)

        Require the current matrix to have exactly the given number of columns and match the number of rows with other dimensions in other matrices based on the rows variable name.

        Parameters:
        rows - Variable name for the number of rows in the matrix
        cols - Fixed number of columns to require.

      • dim

        public static ValidationContext dim(ValidationContext $receiver,
                                    char rows,
                                    char cols)

        Require the current matrix's dimensions to correspond to the given variable names. Compares with other dimensions in other matrices in the context that are assigned the same variable name and raises an error if they don't all match.

        Parameters:
        rows - Variable name for the number of rows in the matrix
        cols - Variable name for the number of cols in the matrix

      • getTransposable

        public static ValidationContext getTransposable(ValidationContext $receiver)

        Accept a transposed version of the matrix as satisfying the dimensions check. For example, allow a 1 x 3 matrix when dimensions are declared as 3 x 1.
